metadata.title: Glitter Teardrop Earrings, 12 Assorted Designs (1.5 x 2.2 In, 12 Pairs)
features: DANGLE EARRINGS FOR WOMEN: Add some charm to your ensemble or jewelry collection with these glitter teardrop earrings that feature fashionable shimmering colors
PERFECT FOR: These glitter earrings make beautiful gifts for friends and family on birthdays, anniversaries, Christmas, or Valentines day
DIMENSIONS: These hook earrings measure approximately 1.5 x 2.2 inches excluding the hook
MATERIAL: Each teardrop earring pair is thoughtfully crafted with polyurethane (PU) material and stainless steel hooks for for safe use
WHAT’S INCLUDED: This glitter teardrop earrings set comes with 12 shiny pairs and corresponding rubber backings
description: Beautifully crafted, this faux leather earrings set features 12 different colors boasting faux leather material, glitter, and stainless steel hardware. The hook style makes these an elegant choice to gift to friends, family, or yourself! Glitter teardrop earrings elevate outfits in every style!
